lines.text: I'm not a very good person, Steven. I wanted your love - and I wanted Howard's affection and the security he could give me.
I can give you security too, and more than affection.
You don't really know me at all. My love isn't worth very much.
Do you remember once, I asked you how you could love me and yet marry someone else?
Your marriage was bound to be a failure.
Don't you see that you two together are dangerous? You just have to keep away from one another. In the future, I'm going to see to it that you do.
